name: Goldenage
description:
Goldenage, pirate queen, has caught wind of rumored treasure, hidden somewhere near the seacoast!  She is determined to find it, even if it is the last thing she does!  Help Goldenage and her fellow pirates find the riches and bathe in gold!

Explore the world for weapons and collectibles!

Battle the Spinners!

Defeat all the bosses to find the treasure!

Requirements: Windows, Java


Fabulous Fellini Games
